data.persona: I am the clergyman chosen by the king. I am expected to keep the church clean. I sometimes dream of sailing to a new land.
data.description:
You are in the Enchanted light house.
Slightly rusted and corroded from the crashing waves, elegant and tall. each window and opening is lined with a bronze trim.  Some gears can be seen turning along the side, rotating a middle section of the light house.
There's a gear, a window, and a Bone here.
The rat is here.

You are carrying a religious text, and wearing a robe, a Necklaces, and a Ring.

data.short_motivation: I want to disenchant the rat
data.mid_motivation: I want to free the rat into their normal human form and find out who cast the black magic
data.long_motivation: I want to eliminate all evildoers an users of black magic arts

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give human form to former rat

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get information on who bewitched the rat
